text: 1.27: Ais 1.16-17; 58.6-7; Mt 25.36; Ro 12.2; 1 Zo 5.18Guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi, mben tɨvi guigira nzerara ki, mben tɨvi nza Ndia Fhe Bakɨme nɨman simtɨk thueŋ kɨrga fhu. Ne khaŋ muuŋgi, nza mba ndegi gu ndegmbori vhɨzgi tari ga ndɨkndɨgɨp, vhɨra mba mani vhɨzgi mbigi, nza vhɨra mbe ndɨkndɨgɨp, mben kurkurav mben simtɨgi ndirga. Harigi bigɨna mueŋ vhɨra, nza vhɨra wari won ruru tɨvi gu bigi, nza tuituigip nta ganɨnga, kha nuianan tɨvi nzan muuŋgirim, nza Fhe Bakɨme nɨman nzaŋnzaŋgirga tuktɨgi fhuvara.
